segments.text: I see this kitchen scene unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, totally focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the faucet, overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle but doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, a boy's climbing on this wobbly stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's right there, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how calm everything seems on the outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
